HeroBanner.Title: Hi I'm Fadime!
HeroBanner.Description: I am a computer engineering student with a keen interest in becoming a proficient full-stack developer. I enjoy building websites and apps. My current focus is Next.js(React)

About.Title: About me
About.Description: A Computer Engineering student with a real passion for designing, coding, creating projects, mobile apps and web development. After enrolling in the coding world, I immersed myself in the intricacies of full-stack web development. The allure of programming lies in the thrill of problem-solving. I find immense satisfaction in unraveling complexities and crafting elegant solutions. Proficient in a robust tech stack encompassing React, Next.js, Node.js, and Prisma, I have honed my skills in building dynamic and scalable applications. My toolkit extends to TypeScript and Prisma, adding a layer of precision to my development process. I am always eager to embrace emerging technologies and expand my knowledge base. As a tenacious learner, I thrive on challenges and stay abreast of industry trends to ensure my skills remain cutting-edge. Currently seeking a full-time position as a software developer or Intern, I am poised to contribute my expertise to innovative projects. I am excited about the prospect of collaborating with like-minded professionals and continuing my growth in the dynamic field of software development.
About.SecondPart: When I am not immersed in code, I find solace in my artistic pursuits. I also enjoy learning new things. I am currently learning German, Spanish and Japanese. Learning languages not only broadens my cultural understanding but also presents exciting new challenges.

Experience.Title: Experience
Experience.ExpDesc: Designed websites with Next JS and React JS, making responsive designs and learning Python Django framework for Backend.
Experience.SchoolDesc: Bachelor of Engineering, Major in Computer Engineering

Contact.Title: Let's keep in touch!
Contact.Desc: Please Don’t Hesitate to Contact Me.
